transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir Rupesh baat kar rahe hain Ganesh se. Haan ji sir good afternoon main Reshu baat kar rahi hun senior manager from India Mart Noida office recording line se baat kar rahi hun sir. Abhi sir aapne ek paid buyer no share kiya hai aapki aapke account manager se meeting hui hogi na video meeting.
Customer: Meri nahi hui. Meri meri meri nahi hui. Hamare madam ki hui.
Executive: Fir bhi main baat kar leta hun. Don't worry.
Customer: Sir kahan pe issue aa gaya main mam se baat kar lu sir ek bar aap mujhe bata dijiye.
Executive: Aap kar lo aap mam se mam se baat kar lo.
Executive: Unka number kaun sa hoga sir?
Customer: 8806417171.
Executive: Ek minute sir 88 06 ji 417171.
Customer: Chaliye mam. Thik hai mam ka naam kya hoga sir?
Customer: Urmila madam.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asks about meeting with account manager.

Resolution:

- Customer says meeting happened with his madam.
- Executive asks for madam's contact number.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the madam.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- paid buyer, account manager, meeting, contact number
